channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Hundreds more’ federal agents being deployed in Minnesota after killing of Renee Good – US politics live
item.description: Kristi Noem says that more officers are being deployed amid protests in several cities In response to the news overnight that Donald Trump’s justice d...

item.title: Zahawi failed to secure peerage from Badenoch before Reform UK defection, Tory sources claim – UK politics live
item.description: ‘Given he was sacked for his dodgy tax affairs, this was never going to happen,’ says source Zahawi says he accepts that the Conservatives are to blam...

item.title: Iran crisis live: foreign minister says country ready for negotiations but also ‘fully prepared for war’
item.description: Abbas Araghchi warns adversaries against ‘miscalculation’ as Trump mulls military response to protest crackdown ‘The streets are full of blood’: Irani...

item.title: Greenland’s security ‘firmly’ belongs in Nato, says prime minister, after latest Trump threats to take over territory – Europe live
item.description: Jens-Frederik Nielsen repeated the government’s statement it would work on strengthening security through Nato The European Commission president Ursul...

item.title: Imprisoned hunger striker linked to Palestine Action tells friend: ‘I’m dying’
item.description: Francesca Nadin visited Heba Muraisi, 31, in a Wakefield prison at the weekend and says ‘her body is shutting down’ A prisoner linked to Palestine Act...

item.title: 'I'd take him back in a heartbeat' - which players return to haunt their former clubs?
item.description: After Brighton's Danny Welbeck scored again against Manchester United on Sunday, who has the best record against their former clubs in the Premier Lea...

item.title: Former Tory Chancellor Nadhim Zahawi defects to Reform UK
item.description: The former MP says the UK needs "glorious revolution", as the Conservatives describe Reform as a "party of has-been politicians".

item.title: UFC wants to make Pimblett champion - Tsarukyan
item.description: Arman Tsarukyan was overlooked for the interim lightweight title despite being the division's number one contender.

item.title: Man admits causing golf course crash death
item.description: Suzanne Cherry, 62, died four days after she was hit by a van involved in a police pursuit.

item.title: Fed chair Powell hits out at 'unprecedented' probe by US justice department
item.description: Jerome Powell said he believed the investigation was due to Donald Trump's anger over the Fed's refusal to cut interest rates.
